channel.description: Twitter feed for: @sleepyfox. Generated by nitter.42l.fr

item.title: RT by @sleepyfox: daal is so easy, tasty and nutritious. it’s just boiled with turmeric and salt, and then in a separate pan in ghee or oil you add: cumin, mustard seeds, aesofitida, curry leaves, onion, chilli, tomato, garlic. add to dal. garnish coriander. serve with rice.
item.dc:creator: @Kav_Kaushik
item.description: daal is so easy, tasty and nutritious. it’s just boiled with turmeric and salt, and then in a separate pan in ghee or oil you add: cumin, mustard seeds, aesofitida, curry leaves, onion, chilli, tomato, garlic. add to dal. garnish coriander. serve with rice.

item.title: RT by @sleepyfox: Just today we’ve had a Tory MP suggest women should not be able to make decisions about their own bodies, we’ve had a protestor the government doesn’t like apprehended by police and we’ve been told that only the Prime Minister can approve an investigation into his own conduct
item.dc:creator: @LiamThorpECHO
item.description: Just today we’ve had a Tory MP suggest women should not be able to make decisions about their own bodies, we’ve had a protestor the government doesn’t like apprehended by police and we’ve been told that only the Prime Minister can approve an investigation into his own conduct

item.title: RT by @sleepyfox: 61 Conservative MPs voted against extending abortion access in Northern Ireland last week, including Jacob Rees-Mogg and several other ministers.
item.dc:creator: @AdamBienkov
item.description: 61 Conservative MPs voted against extending abortion access in Northern Ireland last week, including Jacob Rees-Mogg and several other ministers.

item.title:
RT by @sleepyfox: New: Understand the Met is to be placed into effectively what is special measures by HM Inspectorate of Constabulary and Fire and Rescue Services.
Letter to Met cites murder of Sarah Everard, Child Q, and the stop and search of Bianca Williams.
item.dc:creator: @theousherwood
item.description:
New: Understand the Met is to be placed into effectively what is special measures by HM Inspectorate of Constabulary and Fire and Rescue Services.

Letter to Met cites murder of Sarah Everard, Child Q, and the stop and search of Bianca Williams.

item.title: RT by @sleepyfox: Very bad form. @trussliz just left the chamber without listening to even two other speeches. Her bill gives enormous powers to the government without reference to parliament and she can’t even be bothered to listen to parliament

item.description: Very bad form. @trussliz just left the chamber without listening to even two other speeches. Her bill gives enormous powers to the government without reference to parliament and she can’t even be bothered to listen to parliament

item.title: R to @sleepyfox: Here's some documentation for how the Twilio API works, you would have thought a researcher for @techreview would have at least done a cursory search :/ https://support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/articles/223181828-Does-Twilio-check-to-see-if-phone-numbers-can-receive-SMS-
item.dc:creator: @sleepyfox
item.description:
Here's some documentation for how the Twilio API works, you would have thought a researcher for @techreview would have at least done a cursory search :/
support.twilio.com/hc/en-us/…

item.title: Messaging APIs verify basic connectivity before sending texts (e.g. Twilio), so don't believe the article's assertion that "if you reply to a text message you are just confirming your number", the spammers already know this. https://www.technologyreview.com/2022/06/20/1054435/people-trolling-spam-texts/
item.dc:creator: @sleepyfox
item.description:
Messaging APIs verify basic connectivity before sending texts (e.g. Twilio), so don't believe the article's assertion that "if you reply to a text message you are just confirming your number", the spammers already know this.
technologyreview.com/2022/06…

item.title:
RT by @sleepyfox: "The problem is not people being uneducated.
The problem is that people are educated just enough to believe what they have been taught, and not educated enough to question anything from what they have been taught"
Pulling education is nothing but a means to control the people.
item.dc:creator: @Type1Academic
item.description:
"The problem is not people being uneducated.

The problem is that people are educated just enough to believe what they have been taught, and not educated enough to question anything from what they have been taught"

Pulling education is nothing but a means to control the people.

item.title: R to @neil_neilzone: I think that is the whole point. The legal system will be two tier, one rule for the rich, another for the Plebs. This is what we signed the Magna Carta to prevent.
item.dc:creator: @sleepyfox
item.description:
I think that is the whole point.
The legal system will be two tier, one rule for the rich, another for the Plebs.
This is what we signed the Magna Carta to prevent.

item.title: "We say that if you are working class in this country, you deserve a house you can live in, a wage you can take care of your family on and protections when you get old." -- RMT Vs. "Boris Johnson planned to spend £150,000 on buying a treehouse for his son Wilf at Chequers."
item.dc:creator: @sleepyfox
item.description:
